de.lambeck.pned.models.data.validation

Class AbstractValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lambeck.pned.models.data.validation.AbstractValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IValidator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AllNodesOnPathsValidator, EnabledTransitionsValidator, EndPlacesValidator, InitialMarkingValidator, StartPlacesValidator

    public abstract class AbstractValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements IValidator
    Abstract validator for IDataModel to be used in combination with the ValidationController.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected I18NManager i18n
      The manager for localized strings
      protected boolean isInitialModelCheck
      Was the data model just loaded from a PNML file?
      protected IDataModel myDataModel
      The IDataModel to check
      protected IDataModelController myDataModelController
      Reference to the IDataModelController for important messages/results
      protected java.lang.String myDataModelName
      The model name of the IDataModel for checks if the active file has changed during a validation.
      protected IValidationController myValidationController
      Reference to the IValidationController
      protected java.util.List<IValidationMsg> validationMessages
      The List of ValidationMsg produced by this IValidator
      protected java.lang.String validatorInfoString
      The variable for the the I18NManager to get the info string for addValidatorInfo.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractValidator()
      Constructs a stand-alone validator without a reference to the IDataModelController.
      AbstractValidator(IValidationController validationController, IDataModelController dataModelController, I18NManager i18n)
      Constructs this validator with a reference to the IDataModelController to be able to pass important messages/results to it.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void addValidatorInfo()
      Adds an info message with ID and purpose of this validator.
      protected void getDataFromModel(IDataModel dataModel)
      Retrieves the necessary data from the data model.
      boolean hasMoreMessages()
      Returns true if this AbstractValidator has more IValidationMsg in his list of validation messages.
      protected void infoIgnoredForInvalidModel()
      Adds an info message to indicate that this validation is stopped for an invalid model.
      IValidationMsg nextMessage()
      Returns the next IValidationMsg from the list of messages that this IValidator has produced.
      protected void reportValidationSuccessful()
      Adds the final IValidationMsg with status "INFO" to the messages list.
      void startValidation(IDataModel dataModel, boolean initialModelCheck)
      Starts this validation for the specified IDataModel.

                         IDataModelController dataModelController,
                         I18NManager i18n)

        dataModelController - The IDataModelController
        i18n - The manager for localized strings

    • Method Detail

      • startValidation

        public void startValidation(IDataModel dataModel,
                            boolean initialModelCheck)
        Description copied from interface: IValidator
        Starts this validation for the specified IDataModel.
        Specified by:
        startValidation in interface IValidator
        Parameters:
        dataModel - The specified IDataModel
        initialModelCheck - True = data model was just loaded from a PNML file, false = data model has already been checked before.

      • getDataFromModel

        protected void getDataFromModel(IDataModel dataModel)
        Retrieves the necessary data from the data model.
        Parameters:
        dataModel - The specified IDataModel

      • hasMoreMessages

        public boolean hasMoreMessages()
        Description copied from interface: IValidator
        Returns true if this AbstractValidator has more IValidationMsg in his list of validation messages. Otherwise: Removes the reference to the IDataModel and returns false to indicate that this validation is complete.
        Specified by:
        hasMoreMessages in interface IValidator
        Returns:
        True if there are more messages; otherwise false

      • nextMessage

        public IValidationMsg nextMessage()
        Description copied from interface: IValidator
        Returns the next IValidationMsg from the list of messages that this IValidator has produced.
        Specified by:
        nextMessage in interface IValidator
        Returns:
        The next IValidationMsg

      • addValidatorInfo

        protected void addValidatorInfo()
        Adds an info message with ID and purpose of this validator.

      • infoIgnoredForInvalidModel

        protected void infoIgnoredForInvalidModel()
        Adds an info message to indicate that this validation is stopped for an invalid model. Note: This message is an "INFO" message because the ValidationController stores only the highest EValidationResultSeverity anyways.

      • reportValidationSuccessful

        protected void reportValidationSuccessful()
        Adds the final IValidationMsg with status "INFO" to the messages list.
